data.message:
This really is shameful.  I drink diet coke everyday.  I did not sign in via facebook but registered on your web site.  I followed the instructions carefully and when I put the code in it repeatedly stated, 'oops! go back as didn't recognise code'.  All my family tried the code with no luck.
The code is clear.  The instructions are clear.  Your site is not working and I wonder, looking down at other comments, whether it ever worked?  Will it ever work and in turn will anyone ever win a holiday - my thoughts are not...... :(

replies.message: Hi Anne, we're sorry to hear your having problems entering your code. Please could you PM us a photo so that we can look into this for you. Thanks
YAE!  Tried again and it worked. :)
Yes please Anne, via a private message. Thanks
Just waiting for an email that the site said they would send to say that I am in with a chance!?!?!
